Name: What can be done during Heat (general)
Description: All moves will deal chip damage on block
Comment: Cannot K.O. with chip damage, chip damage turns into recoverable health gauge

Name: What can be done during Heat (general)
Description: A Heat Dash can be used when a Heat Engager hits or is blocked (after activation, Heat will end)
Comment: Until Heat Engager reaches the opponent {f-hold} (or {HBHS}), additional chip damage on block

Name: What can be done during Heat (general)
Description: Heat Smash, a move that causes critical damage, can be activated (after activation, Heat will end)
Comment: During Heat {HBHS} (or {2+3})

Name: What can be done during Heat (unique)
Description: Increased chip damage on block for fast multi-hit attacks such as Chain Punch

Name: What can be done during Heat (unique)
Description: Partially restores remaining Heat time with a successful parry or attack reversal unique to Leroy

Name: Heat Burst
Comment: Partially uses remaining Heat time, {2+3,b,b} to cancel attack

Name: Chain Punch: Stem
Comment: Power up during Heat (partially uses remaining Heat time)

Name: Tan Sau Shui Yue Tu
Comment: Has parry effect (partially restores remaining Heat time when successful during Heat), chip damage on block
